titles.title: A bill to recognize the Cabinet status of the Director of the Office of Management and Budget, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 10/27/1987--Introduced. Establishes the position of Director of the Office of Management and Budget as a cabinet position at level I of the Executive Schedule. Upgrades the Deputy Director position to level II of the Executive Schedule.
